ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that your Lord is the only Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your God is surely only One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your God is indeed One;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely your Allah is One:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord is surely One;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: indeed your God is certainly One,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, verily, your Allah is one!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily your Ilah (God) is indeed One (i.e. Allah);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:4] Indeed your God, O people of Mecca, is certainly One,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord is surely One) without a son or partner; this oath says: people of Mecca, your Lord is One, He has no son or partner.
